name: RPG Maker MV Encrypted OGG File
summary: Learn about .RPGMVO files and view a list of programs that open them.

content: When creating a game in RPG Maker MV, you may use OGG audio for different elements of the game. When the project is deployed, the audio files are encrypted and placed in the game directory:
The audio files are encrypted to protect against modification and are not meant to be manually opened. However, you can decrypt RPGMVM files using Petschkos RPG-Maker MV-File Decrypter.
NOTE: .M4A files may also be used for audio in the RPG Maker MV game. They are encrypted as .RPGMVM files by RPG Maker MV.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
